fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You can tear up, lament, or sink a player's heart.
> _ _
> Tear Up: Cause a storm of tears to befall a person's house, making them untargetable for this night and the next.
> Lament: Incur a mass lamentation throughout the town, roleblocking every non-Unseen role in the game. (One use)
> Sinking Heart: Cause a player's heart to sink. For the rest of the game, every non-Unseen player they visit will be roleblocked by them.
> _ _
> Additionally, those that visit you will be miserable and lose their attributes the following night.
